recipe.title: Orange-Tini
ingredients: 2/3 cup Grand Marnier or other orange liqueur
instructions: Mix first 4 ingredients in large pitcher. Cover pitcher with plastic wrap and place in freezer until mixture is cold, about 3 hours. Remove pitcher from freezer; add ice cubes. Stir briskly to melt ice partially. Strain into chilled Martini glasses. Garnish each glass with orange twist.
